title: Cross-Repo Infrastructure Improvements
description: High-value infrastructure improvements ported from ai-eng-dashboard to monorepo: structured logging, correlation context, stale artifact detection, and selective .claude copy for worktrees.

decision_log.details: Spec group created with 4 atomic specs for cross-repo infrastructure porting from ai-eng-dashboard
spec.md created with 4 workstreams, 7 ACs in parent spec, 28 ACs across atomic specs, 20 tasks total
as-001 through as-004 authored with full AC, task lists, and evidence tables

Applied 8 fixes from interface investigation: INC-001 (checkArtifactFreshness signature), INC-002 (shared SENSITIVE_KEYS), INC-003 (optional correlation import), INC-004 (logger fake update), INC-005 (verified ARTIFACT_SOURCE_DIRS), INC-006 (Record not Map), INC-007 (journal singular), INC-009 (sg- prefix)
